reuters.title: WELBILT <WELB.O> ACQUIRES FOOD HANDLING SYSTEMS
reuters.body: Welbilt Corp said it acquired <Food Handling Systems Inc> of Dallas, a producer of commercial ovens, conveyers and proofer systems. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed. Food Handling, which also produces equipment for the commercial baking industry, was privately owned by Richard Shumway of Mesa, Ariz., and Vic Ferrara of Dallas, both of whom will remain with the company. The company has manufacturing facilities in Dallas and Phoenix. Reuter 
